fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: During the day, choose a player. They will be invited to your private meal.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: During the night, you and all living players ever invited to your private meal will be allowed to speak in a private chat. This private chat will be allowed to vote each night to give one player in it a pumpkin pie, which gives them Basic defense for two nights.
